query.sql: WITH latest_effects AS ( SELECT recipe_id , MAX(create_date) AS eff_create_date , MAX(update_date) AS eff_update_date FROM cook_effects GROUP BY recipe_id ) SELECT DATE( CASE WHEN latest_create_date > latest_update_date THEN latest_create_date ELSE latest_update_date END ) AS latest_date FROM ( SELECT id , name , create_date , update_date , eff_create_date , eff_update_date , CASE WHEN eff_create_date IS NULL THEN create_date WHEN create_date IS NULL THEN eff_create_date WHEN create_date >= eff_create_date THEN create_date ELSE eff_create_date END AS latest_create_date , CASE WHEN eff_update_date IS NULL THEN update_date WHEN update_date IS NULL THEN eff_update_date WHEN update_date >= eff_update_date THEN update_date ELSE eff_update_date END AS latest_update_date FROM cook_recipes rec LEFT JOIN latest_effects eff on rec.id = eff.recipe_id ) GROUP BY latest_date ORDER BY latest_date DESC

WITH latest_effects AS ( SELECT recipe_id , MAX(create_date) AS eff_create_date , MAX(update_date) AS eff_update_date FROM cook_effects GROUP BY recipe_id ) SELECT id , name , image_data , category_id , category_name , DATE( CASE WHEN latest_create_date > latest_update_date THEN latest_create_date ELSE latest_update_date END ) AS latest_date FROM ( SELECT rec.id , rec.name , cat.id AS category_id , cat.name AS category_name , image_data , CASE WHEN eff_create_date IS NULL THEN rec.create_date WHEN rec.create_date IS NULL THEN eff_create_date WHEN rec.create_date >= eff_create_date THEN rec.create_date ELSE eff_create_date END AS latest_create_date , CASE WHEN eff_update_date IS NULL THEN rec.update_date WHEN rec.update_date IS NULL THEN eff_update_date WHEN rec.update_date >= eff_update_date THEN rec.update_date ELSE eff_update_date END AS latest_update_date FROM cook_recipes rec LEFT JOIN latest_effects eff on rec.id = eff.recipe_id LEFT JOIN cook_categories cat on rec.category_id = cat.id ) WHERE latest_date = {$date} ORDER BY latest_date DESC
